title: Internal Auditor - Tech Infrastructure & Architecture
description:
We’re building the bank of The Free – and our mission is to Make Life Easy for our users with fast, secure, and smart banking experiences 🌈 The Internal Audit team powers this mission by ensuring bunq is moving fast and efficiently, keeping our user’s money safe and always be there for them when they need us most.

Take ownership:

As an Internal Auditor for Tech infrastructure & architecture, you’ll play a critical role in safe guarding bunq's technology, infrastructure and AI systems, so that everything runs smoothly for our users and the teams behind the scenes.

  • Identify and tackle systemic risks on infrastructure, technology, and architecture to the root causes, and recommend fixes before they can have any impact.

  • Drive high-impact corrective actions and track them to closure, turning every audit finding into a measurable and time-bound action.

  • Leverage AI end-to-end in audit projects, from planning to reporting.

title: Offboarding Agent
description:
Our users trust bunq to keep their banking safe and seamless. That means when users who don’t meet our requirements are identified, they are off-boarded correctly, quickly, and fairly — without interrupting the experience of our genuine users who deserve safety, clarity, and ease. Your challenge in this mission is to strengthen our off-boarding operations, making sure the process is automated, compliant, and user-friendly 🚀

Take Ownership

Your mission is to protect good users while ensuring that unverified or non-compliant users are off-boarded with accuracy and transparency 🔎 As our Offboarding Agent in User Quality, you will:

  • Ensure off-boarding processes are fully automated, based on well-defined logic, and aligned with legal and regulatory standards. Decisions must be justified, transparent, and user-friendly.

  • Oversee the timely processing of refunds for off-boarded users, ensuring completion within 32 days and maintaining a fair, consistent experience.

  • Actively track automation performance, identify gaps, and implement fixes quickly. Drive ongoing improvements to reduce user impact and maximize operational efficiency.

title: Reporting Agent
description:
Our users trust bunq to keep their money safe. That means spotting, reporting, and preventing bad actors before they can do harm. Your challenge in this mission is to strengthen our reporting operations, and ensure that we meet local laws and regulations — helping us keep Making Life Easy for our users 🚀

Up for it? Kick off your application by taking our assessment and find out if bunq is your perfect match!

Take ownership

Your mission is to protect our users by making sure suspicious activity is flagged and reported in line with legal and regulatory requirements 🔎 As our Reporting Agent in User Quality, you will:

  1. Ensure compliance by reporting suspicious activity to the appropriate FIUs and implementing country-specific financial crime reporting requirements.

  2. Establish clear procedures and continuously improve reporting processes through gap analysis and automation to enhance scalability, accuracy, and regulatory alignment.

  3. Monitor reporting performance using analytics tools like Retool, Looker, and GSheets, while managing all open CAP items within required deadlines.

title: User Review Agent
description:
Our user wants a bank that is centered around their needs, which includes trust in ongoing services. Your challenge in this mission is to keep them safe by strengthening our compliance operations, and ensure that we are compliant to local laws and regulations - and through this, help us keep Making Life Easy for our users 🚀

Up for it? Kick off your application by taking our assessment and find out if bunq is your perfect match!

Take Ownership

Your mission is to keep our users compliant to bunq's policies and the law, while investigating any potential deviations 🔎 As our User Review Agent, you will serve our users by taking ownership of:

  • User experience

  • Thoroughly investigating and verifying the legitimacy of high-risk clients and transactions.

  • Continuously monitoring accounts for suspicious or unusual activity that could impact our users.

  • Ensuring full compliance with all applicable laws and regulations to protect user’s interests.

title: German Localization and UX Writer
description:
At bunq, we design everything around Eva – our champion user. She represents everyone who relies on our app to make life easy. Our app should feel like home for Eva – intuitive, effortless, and designed around her needs. Your role is to build that connection through words.

As a UX Writer, you'll help guide Eva through the app with ease, turning complexity into clarity, and making her journey simple, actionable, and delightful.

Up for this?

Kick off your application by taking our assessment and find out if bunq is your perfect match! 🚀


Take ownership:

As our UX Writer, you'll take ownership of bringing clarity and impact to every phrase Eva interacts with. Your key responsibilities include:

  • Writing short, actionable, and precise German copy for the bunq app, ensuring clarity and guidance for our user

  • Collaborating closely with Product Owners and UX Designers to create seamless user experiences tailored to Eva’s needs

  • Developing and maintaining messaging frameworks that uphold bunq's tone of voice while assessing their effectiveness

  • Using product testing methods like A/B testing and usability studies to evaluate and iterate on UX copy based on user behavior and preferences

  • Embedding your copy directly into prototypes using tools like Figma, ensuring cohesive design and content integration

  • Balancing inspiration and practicality in your messaging to guide Eva without overwhelming her

title: Internal Auditor - Data Security & AI
description:
Our users trust bunq to protect their data, their money, and their privacy — always.

When they save, pay, or use AI-powered features, they expect their data to stay safe, encrypted, and used only in ways they approve. The Internal Auditor – Data Security & AI makes sure bunq’s data handling, cybersecurity, and AI systems always live up to those expectations: secure, ethical, and compliant.

Through risk-based audits, you’ll dive deep into data security, AI governance, privacy (GDPR), and compliance standards (such as: PCI DSS, CIS, DORA, PSD2, AI Act). You’ll surface risks before they ever reach our users, and push for solutions that fix root causes — not just patch symptoms. On top of that, you’ll enhance and automate our System Checker, taking it to the next level.

Take ownership 🚀

As our Internal Auditor – Data Security & AI, you’ll:

  1. Spot and prevent risks before they matter – identify systemic data and AI issues early and recommend bold, lasting fixes.

  2. Turn findings into action – make sure every risk results in measurable improvements, tracked and closed fast.

  3. Use AI to raise the bar – embed AI into audits themselves, from smart analysis to predictive risk reporting.

title: Social Media Manager
description:
At bunq, we're not just building a banking app; we're reshaping how people around the world experience financial freedom. As a Social Media Manager, you’ll be instrumental in bringing awareness to this mission by crafting content that cuts through the noise. Elevate our voice and leave a lasting impact on both minds and feeds.



Take Ownership

As bunq's Social Media Manager to take ownership of our presence on LinkedIn, X, and YouTube. You’ll be responsible for creating and executing our social media strategy, developing content that resonates with our audiences (both users and potential employees), and experimenting with new formats that push our channels forward.

  • Plan & Strategize: Build and own a content calendar aligned with our company agenda, user personas, and employer brand.

  • Create Content: Produce engaging posts and visuals for LinkedIn, X, and YouTube. You’ll create about 80% of the content yourself, supported by AI tools and a filmmaker for YouTube.

  • Experiment & Grow: Shape our YouTube presence from the ground up - test new formats, learn what works, and build a strategy that scales.

  • Optimize Performance: Track analytics, measure impact, and continuously refine our content for engagement and growth.

  • Benchmark & Iterate: Keep an eye on competitors and industry trends to make sure we stay ahead.

title: Fraud Perpetrators Owner
description:
We’re on a mission to change the future of banking by Making Life Easy for our users.

To achieve this mission, we are committed to protecting our users and maintaining a strong reputation as a trustworthy and secure platform. We are actively working to prevent fraud and keep perpetrators (scammers, criminals, and fraudsters) away.

As bunq’s Fraud Perpetrator Owner, you will play a key role in achieving this by:

  • preventing perpetrators from accessing and exploiting our platform, while ensuring a seamless experience for legitimate users. 

  • Taking end-to-end ownership to map, analyze, optimize, and automate fraud prevention processes. This includes the opportunity to build solutions from the ground up, leveraging AI and other technologies where applicable.

  • Evaluating potential risks against benefits in decision-making, prioritizing actions that safeguard both our users and bunq's interests.

Up for the challenge?

Kick off your application by taking our assessment and find out if bunq is your perfect match! 🍭

title: UX Writer
description:
At bunq, we design everything around Eva – our champion user. She represents everyone who relies on our app to make life easy. Our app should feel like home for Eva – intuitive, effortless, and designed around her needs. Your role is to build that connection through words.

As a UX Writer, you'll help guide Eva through the app with ease, turning complexity into clarity, and making her journey simple, actionable, and delightful.

Take ownership:

As our UX Writer, you'll take ownership of bringing clarity and impact to every phrase Eva interacts with. Your key responsibilities include:

  • Writing short, actionable, and precise English copy for the bunq app, ensuring clarity and guidance for our user

  • Collaborating closely with Product Owners and UX Designers to create seamless user experiences tailored to Eva’s needs

  • Developing and maintaining messaging frameworks that uphold bunq's tone of voice while assessing their effectiveness

  • Using product testing methods like A/B testing and usability studies to evaluate and iterate on UX copy based on user behavior and preferences

  • Embedding your copy directly into prototypes using tools like Figma, ensuring cohesive design and content integration

  • Balancing inspiration and practicality in your messaging to guide Eva without overwhelming her

title: Reporting & Offboarding Lead
description:
Our users count on bunq for safe, seamless, and transparent banking. As Reporting & Off-boarding Lead, you’ll make sure we detect risks early, report them correctly, and off-board users who don’t meet compliance standards. You’ll build scalable processes, drive automation, and guide your team to deliver impact every day. Your mission? Protect our users and bunq, while keeping banking effortless. 🌈

Take ownership

  • Mentor and guide your team to deliver reporting & off-boarding excellence.

  • Own regulatory alignment across financial crime reporting and off-boarding.

  • Drive smarter, scalable processes through automation.

title: Business Onboarding Process Lead
description:
We believe that opening a business bank account should be as easy as taking your business online—and we mean easy. Our goal is a seamless, fast, and transparent onboarding experience for every business owner. As our Business Onboarding Process Lead, you’ll ensure that we keep our promise to onboard businesses in 5 minutes or less.

Your expertise will reshape and automate onboarding processes, cut through unnecessary back-and-forth, and give businesses the clarity they need every step of the way. Through this, you’ll help us deliver a delightful user experience, showing entrepreneurs they’ve chosen the right bank for their financial journey.

Up for this?

Kick off your application by taking our assessment and find out if bunq is your perfect match! 🚀

Take ownership:
As the Business Onboarding Process Lead, you’ll own the processes that make it possible for companies to get started right away. Specifically, you’ll be in charge of:

  • Data-driven problem solving: Conduct weekly analyses of users that don’t meet our 5-minute onboarding promise, identify root causes, and reduce inefficiencies to keep that figure below 4%.

  • Clear communication: Ensure users in onboarding always know what is expected of them, what they need to do next, and receive a clear timeline for their account verification.

  • Policy optimisation: Conduct quarterly reviews of SBI codes, risk labels, and acceptance policies to remove unnecessary blockers while maintaining compliance

  • Leverage APIs: Use service providers where possible to directly collect and verify user data, boosting 5-minute onboarding

description:

title: Onboarding Risk Analyst
description:
Every user who joins bunq deserves a secure, fast, and frictionless onboarding experience. As an Onboarding Risk Analyst, your mission is twofold: stop fraudsters before they enter, and optimize the flow for legitimate users so they breeze through in minutes. You’ll use data, intuition, and collaboration to design smart defenses that don’t slow down honest customers. Help us protect bunq while keeping our 5-minute onboarding promise.

Up for this?

Kick off your application by taking our assessment and find out if bunq is your perfect match! 🚀


Take ownership:
Own the risk–friction balance:

  • Continuously refine onboarding flows to reduce false positives and eliminate unnecessary steps for good users.

  • Tune rules and checks to auto-deny bad actors while minimizing manual reviews and delays for legitimate ones.

Prevent fraud at the door:

  • Design and implement strategies to detect and block fraudulent signups (e.g., synthetic identities, device spoofing, multi-accounting).

  • Respond quickly to emerging fraud patterns with updated rules and decision logic.

Act on data, fast:

  • Use SQL, Excel, dashboards, and risk tooling to track onboarding KPIs like false positives, time to onboard, manual review rate, and fraud rate.

  • Run experiments (e.g., A/B tests) to measure the impact of changes on both fraud prevention and user conversion.

Collaborate across the company:

  • Work closely with Product, Compliance, and Engineering to implement effective and user-friendly onboarding checks.

  • Optimize performance of KYC and fraud vendors (e.g., Onfido, Incode) and push for faster, more accurate results.

title: Compliance Agent (Legal Account Restriction)
description:
As a Legal Account Restriction Guide, your mission is to handle legal account restrictions with accuracy, speed, and empathy, so our users feel safe, informed, and supported — even when things get complicated.

Why this matters:

At bunq, our mission is to Make Life Easy — for our users, our teams, and the world around us.

When users face legal restrictions on their account, they need to know their money is safe, their rights are protected, and their case is being handled with care. You’ll be the one to make that happen — ensuring legal compliance without leaving users in the dark.

As a Legal Account Restriction Guide, you’ll be the calm in the storm, making sure users understand what’s happening, what’s next, and what we’re doing to help.

Take ownership:

As a Legal Account Restriction Guide, you’ll take charge of key responsibilities that directly impact our users’ trust, bunq’s legal compliance, and the speed of our operations.

Your key responsibilities:

  • Handle legal account restrictions such as bankruptcies, garnishments, and court orders with full legal accuracy.

  • Communicate clearly with users, explaining restrictions, timelines, and next steps in a way they understand and trust.

  • Use AI and automation tools to process cases efficiently and accurately.

  • Spot and fix process gaps, constantly improving how we handle legal cases without adding friction.

  • Collaborate across teams, keeping legal, compliance, and operations aligned on each case.

What you’ll work on right away:
→ Manage incoming legal orders, apply restrictions accurately, and track them through resolution.
→ Support users during restrictions, sending clear, timely updates.
→ Lift or adjust restrictions as soon as legal conditions allow, ensuring user access is restored fast.
→ Keep a clean audit trail, documenting actions and decisions for transparency and compliance.
→ Improve processes using data, helping bunq move faster while staying 100% compliant.

title: Android Developer
description:
At bunq, we’re revolutionizing financial freedom worldwide. As part of the bunq and tricount team, you’ll design and develop mobile applications that simplify banking and group expense management for millions of users. Collaborate with our team to deliver seamless, secure, and user-friendly experiences on the Android platform.

Take Ownership

You'll be a vital part of the team that builds and refines our app to give millions of people a smooth, secure, and powerful way to manage their money.

  • Craft top-notch Android applications for both the bunq and tricount apps, revolutionizing how users experience banking and group expense management 💡

  • Team up with cross-functional squads to brainstorm, build, and launch exciting new features across both platforms 🚀

  • Fine-tune performance, boost quality, and enhance responsiveness to deliver a seamless, standout user experience for everyone 🎯

title: Legal Account Restriction Lead
description:
As Legal Account Restrictions Lead, your mission is to protect both bunq and our users by applying legal restrictions the right way—fast, fair, and crystal clear.
You'll lead the team that makes sure users are informed, secure, and never left in the dark.

Why this matters:

At bunq, our mission is to Make Life Easy — for our users, our teams, and the world around us.
The Legal Account Restrictions team makes this happen by following legal orders with precision while keeping users informed and empowered.

As Legal Account Restrictions Lead, you’ll ensure we follow the law to the letter—without creating friction for our users. You’ll lead with care, build efficient systems, and drive impact with smart automation.

Take ownership:

As a Legal Account Restrictions Lead, you’ll take charge of key responsibilities that directly impact bunq’s risk management, compliance standards, and users’ trust when legal issues arise.

Your key responsibilities:

  • Ensure fast and accurate legal account restrictions by applying regulatory requirements with precision.

  • Lead and coach a high-performing team, ensuring ownership, speed, and empathy in every case.

  • Use AI to scale operations, improve accuracy, and reduce manual work without compromising compliance.

  • Design clear, user-first processes that meet legal obligations while keeping Eva informed every step of the way.

  • Maintain compliance excellence, keeping all documentation and trainings up to date.

What you’ll work on right away:
→ Legal Account Restrictions Handling → Automate detection and application of restrictions, and notify users with meaningful updates via our AI agent.
→ Escalation Management → Investigate escalated cases, decide the right course of action, and communicate it clearly and empathetically.
→ Audit Trail & Communication → Keep clear logs, follow up with authorities, and auto-unblock when legally allowed.
→ Quality Control & Coaching → Sample resolved cases weekly, share top learnings, and lead biweekly micro-trainings.
→ Process Optimization → Identify gaps, improve internal tools and documentation, and manage team capacity to ensure timely and high-quality case handling.

title: Head of Retention - New
description:
At bunq, we’re all about making life easy for our users - and that doesn’t stop once they join us. As Head of Retention, you’ll take full ownership of how we engage, and keep our users coming back for more. Every touchpoint should feel personal, valuable, and perfectly timed for their life stage and behavior.

If you love blending data, creativity, and strategy to keep users happy and loyal, this is the role for you.

Take ownership

  • Own the retention journey: Drive engagement by ensuring every interaction feels relevant, seamless, and rewarding.

  • Spot and act on behaviors: Track user patterns to understand loyalty - and respond quickly when engagement dips.

  • Help users discover more: Guide them to the features that fit their needs so they can get the most out of bunq.

  • Keep improving: Use behavioral insights to reduce friction, sharpen communication, and constantly level up the experience.

title: Cards Experience Guide
description:
As a Cards Experience Guide, you’ll be the first person our user turns to when something goes wrong with a card payment. Whether it's a declined transaction, a suspicious charge, or a request for a refund, you’ll step in to make things right — quickly and carefully.

You'll review and issue chargebacks and refunds, making sure every case is handled with accuracy and fairness. Just as important, you’ll keep our user in the loop the whole time — clearly explaining what’s happening, what’s coming next, and if any action is needed from their side.

Take Ownership

By picking up issues quickly, resolving them with the right solution, and keeping them in the loop you will Make Life Easy for our users. You work with the right teams to fix root causes and support payment operations in solving even the most complex problems 🚀

title: Cards Experience Guide
description:

title: Payment Experience Guide
description:
As a Payments Experience Guide, you’ll be our user’s go-to hero whenever something goes wrong with a payment. Whether a transfer didn’t go through or something just feels off, you’ll step in to investigate with care and precision. You'll make sure everything is resolved accurately and fast — no guesswork, no confusion.

Take Ownership

Your job is more than fixing problems: it's about keeping our users informed, reassured, and confident at every step. You'll explain what’s happening, what’s next, and what (if anything) they need to do. You’ll turn frustrating moments into smooth experiences — and help make banking feel effortless.

title: Payment Experience Guide
description:

Take ownership:

You'll explain what’s happening, what’s next, and what (if anything) they need to do. You’ll turn frustrating moments into smooth experiences — and help make banking feel effortless.

title: Medior Legal Counsel
description:
To Make Life Easy for our users, we want to build a bank with a legal team that our users can rely on. Your mission is to increase efficiency of providing answers to users' request, while supporting bunq by building and optimizing our legal responses and processes in accordance with regulatory developments in our core countries.

Up for this? Kick off your application by taking our assessment and find out if bunq is your perfect match 🌱

Take ownership

As our Medior Legal Counsel, you will be taking ownership of:

  • Stay updated on upcoming regulations and apply them to the users’ benefit (product reviews) by finding legal solutions.

  • Handel special user circumstances and claims and disputes from third-parties, regulators or others.

  • Providing legal reviews and advice to other bunqers on different contracts and partnerships 📑

title: Support Group Lead
description:
At bunq, our mission is to Make Life Easy for our users by giving them full freedom over their money, wherever they are in the world 🌈

The Support Team plays a key role in making this happen by being the experts behind the scene, ensuring our AI solves any complex issues with speed, care and empathy. Whenever one of our users reaches out to Support from their app, there is a Support Experience Guide ready to help our AI in providing the best solution to fix their problem at the root, making it smarter and more helpful in every interaction 🚀

As a Support Group Lead, your work will directly impact our ability to not only fix our user’s issues, but also build trust through one thoughtful solutions at the time, helping us keep banking safe, smart, and easy.

Take ownership

Make Life Easy for our users by leading a team of Support Experience Guides and ensure an excellent and smooth user experience 🌈

Your key responsibilities:

  • You lead your team to the best of their ability, performing through training our AI and achieving consistently high user satisfaction scores through their interactions with our users.

  • You ensure your team delivers high quality results in their interactions with our users by achieving 95% on their quality reviews

  • You foster a collaborative environment within your team, allowing them to thrive and perform as best as they can.

  • In case a member in your team struggles, you help them get back on track and improve.

title: iOS Developer
description:
At bunq, we're not just building a banking app; we're reshaping how people around the world experience financial freedom. As an iOS Developer, you’ll be instrumental in crafting and maintaining cutting-edge mobile applications that elevate our users' banking journeys. Collaborate with our dynamic team to deliver a seamless, innovative, and user-friendly experience on the iOS platform.

Take Ownership

  • Develop and maintain scalable iOS architecture, ensuring efficiency and a seamless user experience using Swift and iOS SDK.

  • Integrate and optimize REST APIs, managing authentication, error handling, and data flow for smooth performance.

  • Enhance CI/CD and testing automation, maintaining fast release cycles and ensuring robust app quality.

  • Develop new features and fix bugs proactively, keeping performance sharp and delivering a seamless experience for Eva.

title: Information Security Manager (CISO)
description:
Every user, system, and transaction at bunq deserves to be secure by design. As our Information Security Manager your mission is twofold: safeguard bunq’s platforms against evolving threats and ensure compliance with the world’s most demanding regulations—without slowing down innovation. You’ll combine strategic oversight, hands-on engineering insight, and cross-team coordination to close security gaps before they become incidents.

Take Ownership:

  • Aligning bunq’s strategy with applicable security regulations, assessing security risks (including vulnerabilities), and deciding which to remediate, mitigate, or accept.

  • Security engineering within SecOps, ensuring secure system and application design that is resilient, up-to-date with evolving threats, and compliant with relevant standards.

  • Continuous security assurance through regular audits, penetration tests, configuration reviews, and coordinated IT security operations with IT Risk, Compliance, and the management board.

  • Closing control gaps by monitoring regulatory developments, threat intelligence, and best practices; directing remediation, maintaining the Information Security Policy, and engaging auditors and regulators.

title: User Quality Agent
description:
Our user wants a bank that is centered around their needs, which includes trust in ongoing services. Your challenge in this mission is to strengthen our compliance operations, and ensure that we are compliant to local laws and regulations - and through this, help us keep Making Life Easy for our users 🚀

Up for it? Kick off your application by taking our assessment and find out if bunq is your perfect match!

Take ownership

Your mission is to keep our users compliant to bunq's policies and the law, while investigating any potential deviations 🔎 As our User Quality Agent, you will serve our users by taking ownership of:

  • User experience 🌱 

  • Understanding and applying bunq's AML (Anti Money Laundering) guidelines when reviewing cases

  • Reviewing user transactions, including complex cases that need careful decision-making

  • Process improvements to ensure compliance with laws and regulations

title: Data Protection Officer
description:
At bunq, we're not just creating a banking app; we're reshaping how people around the world experience financial freedom. As a Data Protection Officer you'll be responsible for ensuring compliance with data protection regulations and policies. You will be the point of contact for data protection authorities and individuals on data protection matters.

If you are passionate about data protection and have a strong understanding of the relevant regulations, we would like to hear from you.

Join us at bunq and help us maintain the highest standards of data protection for our customers and employees. 🚀

Take Ownership

  • Develop and implement privacy policies and procedures 🔐

  • Conduct regular audits to identify and address data protection issues 🕵🏽‍♀️

  • Review and sign off on privacy risk assessments prepared by the Operations’s - Data Protection 📄

title: Senior Compliance Officer
description:
Our user wants a bank that is centered around their needs, which includes trust in ongoing services. Your challenge in this mission is to strengthen our regulatory framework, and ensure that our services remain compliant to local laws and regulations - and through this, help us keep Making Life Easy for our users 🚀

Up for it? Kick off your application by taking our assessment and find out if bunq is your perfect match 🖇️


What you'll do
As our Senior Compliance Officer, you will be taking ownership by:

  • Using a data-driven approach to prioritize and improve compliance processes and models without losing efficiency 📑

  • Engaging with key stakeholders (i.e. first line, risk, audit) and work cooperatively to present, create, develop and/or implement the requirements related to AML/CFT & Sanctions regulation

  • Maintaining internal policies and guidelines on different subject matters, and ensuring bunq stays compliant with local laws and regulations 💪🏻

title: User Verification Agent
description:
We promise our users a seamless verification experience, ensuring their accounts are verified quickly and securely. Your mission? Help our users get their personal and business accounts verified without unnecessary delays while making the onboarding process as smooth as possible. 🚀

Take Ownership

  • Make Life Easy for our users by ensuring a hassle-free onboarding experience. 

  • Manually review our users based on our user verification policies. 

  • Stay ahead by keeping up with process updates and ensuring a clear verification path for our users. 

  • Minimize delays by following the support triangle and keeping our users informed about their next steps. 

  • Spot and report bugs or inefficiencies, making our onboarding process even better.

    Are you ready to make user verification seamless and secure? Let’s go! 🌈

title: Support Experience Guide
description:
As a Support Experience Guide, you’re the expert behind the scenes — ensuring our AI assistant solves complex issues with speed, care, and empathy.  You’re not just fixing problems: you’re building trust, one thoughtful solution at a time 🌈

 If needed, you don't refrain from stepping in the spotlight, assisting our users directly over chat/emails mostly, or occasionally over the phone; whenever there’s something that just needs human eyes — you’re there 💪

Take ownership:

  • Ensure our users feel supported, understood, and never left behind

  • Contribute to improve our AI tool by fine-tuning its responses

  • Guide our AI in every interaction into becoming smarter

  • Drive solutions for the underlying issues that push our users to reach out to support

title: SOS Hotline Support Guide
description:
We promise our users a hassle free banking experience; In case they experience an urgent issue with their bunq account, they need reassurance with a quick & straightforward resolution and be sure bunq always has their back when it counts most 🌈 As a SOS Hotline Support Guide, your mission is to provide our users with the empathetic and efficient assistance they need when they reach out to our SOS Hotline, resolving their issues in no time 🚀

Take ownership
Make Life Easy for our users by making data-driven decisions with a user-centric approach 🤝

  • Serve as the first point of contact for any user calling our SOS Hotline

  • Deliver a top notch customer experience by understanding our user's needs and issue, to provide them with a resolution in the most empathetic way

  • Stay up to date with our processes and master them to help our users as efficiently as you can

  • Collaborate with operational teams, contributing to constantly improve our user's satisfaction and quality of service

  • Make use of our internal AI tools to streamline your work and focus on what truly matters

  • You’re the kind of person others rely on - steady, thoughtful, and proactive

title: Fraud Ops Analyst
description:
We’re all about giving our users a smooth, worry-free banking experience while keeping their money safe from fraudsters 🛡️ As a Fraud Ops Analyst, you’ll be the go-to person for spotting any suspicious activity, protecting users at every stage, and making sure we stay compliant with all the rules.

You’ll handle everything related to fraud cases, take charge of tricky situations, and come up with smart ideas to make our processes even better for a safer and smoother banking experience.


Take Ownership

• Become a detective in fraud prevention, using your in-depth investigation and problem-solving skills to protect our users from suspicious activity 🕵️‍♂️

• Keep an eye out for potential risks, using your knowledge of fraud monitoring and prevention to stay one step ahead

• Bring empathy and effective communication into every interaction to provide the best support possible
